00054 template<unsigned DIM>
00055 class FarhadifarForce  : public AbstractForce<DIM>
00056 {
00057 friend class TestForces;
00058 
00059 private:
00060 
00061     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00069     template<class Archive>
00070     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00071     {
00072         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractForce<DIM> >(*this);
00073         archive & mAreaElasticityParameter;
00074         archive & mPerimeterContractilityParameter;
00075         archive & mLineTensionParameter;
00076         archive & mBoundaryLineTensionParameter;
00077     }
00078 
00079 protected:
00080 
00084     double mAreaElasticityParameter;
00085 
00089     double mPerimeterContractilityParameter;
00090 
00094     double mLineTensionParameter;
00095 
00099     double mBoundaryLineTensionParameter;
00100 
00101 
00102 public:
00103 
00107     FarhadifarForce();
00108 
00112     virtual ~FarhadifarForce();
00113 
00122     virtual void AddForceContribution(AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>& rCellPopulation);
00123 
00133     virtual double GetLineTensionParameter(Node<DIM>* pNodeA, Node<DIM>* pNodeB, VertexBasedCellPopulation<DIM>& rVertexCellPopulation);
00134 
00138     double GetAreaElasticityParameter();
00139 
00143     double GetPerimeterContractilityParameter();
00144 
00148     double GetLineTensionParameter();
00149 
00153     double GetBoundaryLineTensionParameter();
00154 
00160     void SetAreaElasticityParameter(double areaElasticityParameter);
00161 
00167     void SetPerimeterContractilityParameter(double perimeterContractilityParameter);
00168 
00174     void SetLineTensionParameter(double lineTensionParameter);
00175 
00181     void SetBoundaryLineTensionParameter(double boundaryLineTensionParameter);
00182 
00188     void OutputForceParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile);
00189 };
